summary: This mod aims to bring all the talk about how much better SkyForge Steel weapons are into reality.... Well reality in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/38189459/SkyForge2.png[/img]

[size=26]Hello, and welcome to my small mod[/size]

So what does this do? Well it changes the damage SkyForge Steel weapons do to make them worth getting on your adventures in Skyrim. It also gives them a unique texture to give them a unique feel. Take a look at the video below for a preview

[url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xs6ntz_skyrim-mod-preview-skyforge-steel-redone_videogames] Click Here for the Video! [/url]

===========
CHANGELOG
===========

Version v2

    - Added New Enchantment. Extra damage vs Humanoids
    - Fixed Texture Bug 

Version V1.1

    Mesh Bug Fixed 

==============
FUTURE PLANS
==============
Future plans include different version of strength, alternate textures and added Enchantments
author: Sakotius

files.name: Skyforge steel Redone V2
files.changelogHtml:
Added New Enchantment. Extra damage vs Humanoids
